entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @Hoosiers1986 @realDonaldTrump Sorry but he only loves the idea of using  4th of July imagery in campaign ads. It’s all about him. Meanwhile, Covid-19 cases are spiking. His rallies are irresponsible and wreckless beyond all comprehension. He is making the US a failed state, and it’s as sad as it is maddening.
